page.title: 11MUSIC IN BODMIN
page.content: In the Comprehensive School we have a{ {Band}consisting of :- Clarinets, Flutes, Oboes, Tubas, Euphoniums, Saxaphones, Trumpets, Trombones, Horns, Glockenspiel, Xylophone, Drum Kit and other percussion instruments. There is also a{jazz band}and an { {orchestra.}These meet weekly at different times on Tuesday.{ {Peripatetic}music teachers travel around {Wadebridge, Camelford and {Bodmin}schools to teach children who want to learn how to play a musical instrument. I play the clarinet in the School Band. The band plays at concerts and fetes in Cornwall and sometimes in other counties and abroad. We have two music teachers at school and in our class lessons we sing and clap music rhythms. In Bodmin there is also a music centre for younger children and a choir.
